name: DEEPDIVE (Okere)
description:
DEEPDIVE is a fast-paced, hyper casual arcade game. The game features a simple minimalist art style that supports the unique color switching mechanic.

Key Features:

  • Color switch
  • Over 20 various obstacle types to avoid
  • Multiple palettes to customize the look of your game
  • Leaderboards and achievements

DEEPDIVE was an individual final year University project intended to explore mobile development and optimisation.
